content: अपवर्तनं {@--1@} Removal, transferring from one place to another; स्थान°. {@--2@} Taking away, depriving one of; न त्यागोस्ति द्विषंत्याश्च न च दायापवर्तनं <ls>Ms. 9. 79.</ls> {@--3@} Abridging, abbreviation. {@--4@} Reducing a fraction to its lowest terms; division without remainder, or the divisor itself.
